entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Weyburn
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 13. Forecast issued 8:14 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
